derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'finding out, discovery'): from Latin inventio(n-), from invenire 'discover' (see invent)

encyclopedia.content: 创意曲invention 复调结构的钢琴小曲。类似前奏曲或小赋格曲。巴赫始用此名称使命召唤6狙击步枪 一次可装子弹数量：5发 全名：invention m2000 子弹类型：穿甲弹 这把枪应该是COD6中威力最高的枪了，笔者用着感觉还不错，和巴雷特相比，稳定性低了不少，而且子弹只有5发，新手多半很难上手 剧情出现：赤色黎明（狼獾之灾），一如往日（注意是消音的） 优点：威力是所有狙击枪里面最大的 缺点：子弹太少，只有5发，稳定过低，换弹

entry.def: An invention is a machine, device, or system that has been invented by someone.

example.ex: It's been a tricky business marketing his new invention...
example.tran: 推广他的新发明一直是件棘手的事情。

example.ex: The spinning wheel was a Chinese invention.

entry.def: Invention is the act of inventing something that has never been made or used before.

example.ex: More than eight million books were printed within fifty years after the invention of the printing press.
example.tran: 印刷机发明以后的 50 年间,有 800 多万册图书被印刷。

entry.def: If you refer to someone's account of something as an invention, you think that it is untrue and that they have made it up.

example.ex: In these and several other respects, there are many inventions and exaggerations...
example.tran: 在这些方面和其他几个方面都存在许多捏造与夸张之处。

example.ex: The story was certainly a favourite one, but it was undoubtedly pure invention.
example.tran: 这个故事当然特别受欢迎,但它无疑纯属虚构。

entry.def: Invention is the ability to invent things or to have clever and original ideas.

means.word_mean: 1. the creation of something in the mind
2. a creation (a new device or process) resulting from study and experimentation

stems_affixes.value_cn: 重大的,重要的,多变故的
stems_affixes.word_buile: event[n.事件,事情]+ful充满……的→事件多→多变故的
event[n.事件,事情]+ual……的→出事之后[最终]的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 善于发明或创造的,有发明或创造才能的
stems_affixes.word_buile: invent[v.发明,创造;捏造,虚构]+ive……的→adj.善于发明或创造的,有发明或创造才能的
prevent[v.[from]预防,防止,阻止,制止,妨碍]+ive……的→adj.预防性的
eventual[adj.最后的,结局的,最终的]+ly表副词→adv.最后, 终于
eventual最终的+ity表名词→最终可能发生的
inter之间+vent走+ion表名词→走在二者之间→干涉
invent发明,创造+ion表名词→n.发明, 创造
convention集会;习俗+ality表名词→n.陈规陋习,因袭传统
vent风→v.发泄[情绪],开孔 n.孔,口
ventilate[v.使通风;给…装通风设备]+ion表名词→n.通风
vent风→v.发泄[情绪],开孔 n.孔,口
vent风+ilate=ate表动词→v.使通风;给…装通风设备
